headline: Assessing Stanley Black & Decker (SWK) Valuation As Recent Momentum Meets Mixed Long Term Returns
summary: Stanley Black & Decker (SWK) has been drawing attention after recent trading, with the share price closing at US$89.25 and short term returns showing a mix of single day gains and week long declines. See our latest analysis for Stanley Black & Decker. The recent 1 month share price return of 8.21% and 3 month share price return of 24.25% suggest momentum has been rebuilding, although the 5 year total shareholder return of 43.25% loss highlights how long term holders have had a tougher...
